main event: A bright white, elliptical object was observed in Lake Charles, Louisiana, moving rapidly.
interesting points: The object maneuvered at speeds up to 3000 mph,The observation record indicates it was daytime during the sighting,No sound was reported during the observation,There were no other aircraft noted in the area at the time of the sighting,The conclusion suggested the object could be a balloon or possibly an astronomical source.
witness description: three individuals involved in the report
